features: Waterproof, seam-sealed 100% recycled polyester shell; hood and body are insulated with 150-g Thermolite® Eco92 100% polyester insulation(92% recycled)
Snap on/off three-panel hood has elasticized gusset under the brim for a secure fit; tricot lining at collar, center-back panel and chin guard for cozy warmth
Full-length waterproof zipper with internal wind flap and zipper garage; two handwarmer pockets and left-sleeve pass pocket secured with a snap
Fully elasticized scuffs provide a secure fit over mitts and boots; adjustable elastic boot strap; gusset panel at the rise for mobility
Reflective details on sleeves, zipper pull and all pocket pull tabs
Grow-fit feature in sleeves and legs adds 2 inches for extended wear; hand-me-down ID label inside
